Annotation: Year for which the data was reported.
PUDL utility id. Allows some linkage between FERC & EIA Data.
Total installed capacity for all units (coal or otherwise) that are part of the plant.
Net electricity generation in MWh for all units (coal or otherwise) that are part of the plant.
Total heat content of all fuels consumed (coal or otherwise) by the plant.
Overall heat rate for the plant in BTU per kWh of net generation (fuel_consumed_total_mmbtu / net_generation_mwh).
